body: These nondescript white gloves are a boon to minor spellcasters and fakes who are limited or lacking in magical ability or versatility. The wearer of these gloves can employ mage hand and prestidigitation at will.
name: Apprentice's Cheating Gloves
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Hands/Hands Slot Wondrous Items/Apprentices Cheating Gloves
